page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: considered suitable for able bodied people. They do lots of things at the blind school like performing plays and swimming in their own heated swimming pool. There are two other schools in our area, Lickey First and Middle School and Catshill First School. 280 pupils, aged 5 to 9 years, attend Catshill First School. Lickey First and Middle School caters for three hundred 5 to 12 year olds. Lickey First and Middle School has three departments: one for 5 year olds, one for 6 to 8 year olds and the third for 8 to 12 year olds. There is a field, three playgrounds, a dining hall and gym. Attached to the school is a special unit to help children with specific language disabilities attended by children from other schools.
